text:
@holly_cummins I was just informed over breakfast that she calculated that 12 000 EUR with 2019 energy prices. 🤯

Needless to say... that "little script" (her description) has had an important impact on both the environmental and financial sustainability of the school. #LightSwitchOps = 💚!

author.description: Software Engineer | Conference speaker 🗣️ | Java Focussed | Teacher and Trainer 👨‍🏫 |  Works @InfoSupportBV in Mechelen, BE
author.name: Tom Cools
